detail_desc: Blouse in a viscose weave with a turtle neck and V-shaped opening at the front with sewn-in lacing. Opening with buttons at the back of the neck and long, trumpet sleeves.
Blouse in airy chiffon containing glittery threads with a small frilled collar, concealed buttons down the front and long, raglan puff sleeves with pleats at the cuffs.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and frill-trimmed chest pocket.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey in a straight cut with high slits in the sides.
Fully lined, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a motif on the front and cut-out sections on the shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket, woven chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Short shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and lace shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with an opening at the front and ties at the top. Short, elasticated sleeves, flounces at the front, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, long sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
Tube top in ribbed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft waffle-knit cotton blend with a zipped pocket on one sleeve.
Jumper in textured-knit wool containing some cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Oversized shirt in an organic cotton weave with a grandad collar with a covered button, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Raglan sleeves with wide cuffs with a slit, buttons down the sleeves and at the sides, and a rounded hem.
Cotton jersey top with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, printed jersey with a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one patterned and one with a flounce over the shoulders. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a foldover shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Skinny-fit trousers in stretch twill with a visible button fly, fake front pockets and decorative seams at the knees.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, knee-length kimono in a patterned viscose weave with a shawl collar with twisted ties at the bottom, long, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, side pockets and a fringed hem. Lined.
Trousers in a soft weave. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, front pockets, a fake back pocket, and tapered legs.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in fine-knit linen with buttons down the front.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a shaft that finishes at the knee.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck with lacing.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Trousers in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. High, elasticated waist with a drawstring, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Printed cotton jersey T-shirt.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and wrapover back.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and picot trims.
Top in a double layer of chiffon with narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Made partly from recycled polyester.

Set with a shirt, sweater vest and bow tie or tie. Shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. V-neck sweater vest in fine-knit cotton with ribbed trims. Pre-tied tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Straight-cut top in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in printed, lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a glittery print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
V-neck cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a lightly brushed finish. Ties at the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved playsuit in patterned jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Lace top with a high, smocked collar and long sleeves with smocking and a frill at the cuffs.
Trousers in sturdy jersey with pleats at the top, a tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a tie-detail at one side of the hem.

Set with a hooded jacket and trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Jacket with a pile-lined hood, zip with a chin guard, front pockets and raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved top in a loose rib knit with a deep neckline and twisted detail at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey.
Nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline, gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides.

Fancy dress set with an Alice band, bow tie and tail. Alice band covered in faux fur with sewn-on ears. Padded faux fur tail with a tie and hook and loop fastening. Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric decorated with a heart-shaped plastic stone at the front. Hook and loop fastening at the back.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved hooded jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a contrasting colour longer layer with slits at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap at the top, flap with a twist lock metal fastener, and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x16x20 cm.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders and no buttons.
Lace mini socks.
Pile all-in-one suit with a lined hood and ear appliqués. Zip down the front and along one leg, and opening, foldover ends at the cuffs and hems to cover the hands and feet. Jersey lining.
Romper suit in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, press-studs at the shoulders and crotch, and short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
